column2: "Isn't Signo Gun's speed against the rules? What the hell? How's that happen? There's a limit to cheating."
"I was still able to take it down, though. Er, of course, right? But your average ARKS member who knows nothing about it would be dead meat!"
"You should try it out at least once. At least now you know it's crazy fast, so you won't freak out when you first see it."
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
